name: ax-pre-mulgt0
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cltrr, c0), wbr(nat0, cltrr, c1)), wbr(nat0, cltrr, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
comment: The product of two positive reals is positive. Axiom 21 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-mulgt0 . Normally new proofs would use ~ axmulgt0 . (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
